Articles.Content:
Hello fellow KSP'ers !

We created a new team for the SETI@home where everyone with a computer can participate in the search for extraterrestrial life.
You only need the BOINC software and register an account at SETI@home .
We would love if you join our newly created KSP Fan Group team. Also there are many different science projects to choose if you are not really into SETI.

BOINC is highly configurable and with the default setting it will use you CPU/GPU only when you are not using you computer.

Hope to see you soon crunching!
